A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Pretty disappointed after TFA was so good and set this up to have such awesome potential... Kinda bummed actually. No idea why they didn’t have JJ Abrams direct all 3 but this new director and writer was terrible! They ruin every attempt at making a dramatic scenes with awful attempts to be funny.
